metadata.title: CVE-2024-40767 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Incomplete file access fix and regression for QCOW2 backing files and VMDKflat descriptors

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-40767` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nova-ajax-console-proxy - 2:21.2.4-0ubuntu2.11
